div.div:
Use multiple cores
Fuzz one target with
multiple instances:
One main fuzzer:
-M main
Secondary fuzzers:
-S variant1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 47px; margin-left: 431px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Use multiple machines
Fuzz one target with
multiple machines:
One main fuzzer per server:
-M main-$HOSTNAME
Secondary fuzzers:
-S variant1
Sync between the servers.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 47px; margin-left: 11px;

div.div:
Run afl-fuzz
Reconfigure the
system for optimal speed.
Specify the input corpus directory.
Add a dictionary.
Set a memory limit.

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
